ThingDef.label: thunder warrior ascendance vial
ThingDef.description:
A high-tech containment device holding a potent genetic compound. It is used to initiate the transformation of selected subjects into superhuman warriors. Upon implantation, it triggers rapid genetic enhancements, increasing strength, endurance, and resilience.

This vial contains the gestated genes ready for implantation into a pawn, creating a Thunder Warrior.

The safe implantation age is 12~21, implantation into anyone outside this range may kill them.

This item rapidly deteriorates outside containment.

ThingDef.description:
A high-tech containment device holding a potent genetic compound. It is used to initiate the transformation of selected subjects into superhuman warriors. Upon implantation, it triggers rapid genetic enhancements, increasing strength, endurance, and resilience.

This vial contains the gestated genes ready for implantation into a pawn, creating a Primaris.

ThingDef.label: custodes ascendance vial
ThingDef.description:
A high-tech containment device holding a potent genetic compound. It is used to initiate the transformation of selected subjects into superhuman warriors. Upon implantation, it triggers rapid genetic enhancements, increasing strength, endurance, and resilience.

This vial contains the gestated genes ready for implantation into a pawn, creating a Custodes.

The safe implantation age is 0-3, implantation into anyone outside this range may kill them.

This item rapidly deteriorates outside containment.

ThingDef.label: primarch ascendance vial
ThingDef.description:
A high-tech containment device holding a potent genetic compound. It is used to initiate the transformation of selected subjects into superhuman warriors. Upon implantation, it triggers rapid genetic enhancements, increasing strength, endurance, and resilience.

This vial contains the gestated genes for creation of a Primarch.

Due to the potency of the primarch genes, it needs to be inserted into a human embryo and grown artificially.

This item rapidly deteriorates outside containment.
